text:
kind of a weird issue I ran into today, I had a dangling 'where' that didn't refer to anything but it surprisingly affects the code the compiler generates
```using BenchmarkTools

function foo(x) where BlahBlah
    return x+1
end

function bar(x)
    return x+1
end

let
    @btime foo(127)
    @btime bar(127)
end```
gives
```  10.891 ns (0 allocations: 0 bytes)
  0.020 ns (0 allocations: 0 bytes)```

text: ahh thanks yeah in my case it was causing tons of allocations, too
